segments.text: I ’ m so relieved that your ankle wasn ’ t broken ! I feel just awful about this whole thing . I wanna make it up to you . Let me take you out to dinner tonight . My treat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great ! I ’ d love to ! Here is my address . Pick me up at eight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for such a lovely evening ! The food was amazing , and I had a great time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too.You look so beautiful tonight ! I wish this night would never end.There ’ s something I have to tell you ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I woke up today thinking this would be just like any other ordinary day , but I was wrong . A twist of fate brought us together . I crashed into your life and you into mine , and this may sound crazy , but I ’ m falling in love with you , Veronica .
segments.speaker: S1
